mapper.sql: id, is_delete, update_user_portrait, gmt_create, gmt_modified, user_name, alarm_content, global_trace_id, original_time, match_rule_id
mapper.select: select user_name from ms_alarm_information group by user_name
select count(*) from (select user_name from ms_alarm_information where update_user_portrait = 0 and is_delete = 0 group by user_name,match_rule_id,original_time ) as t1

select user_name as userName,match_rule_id as matchRuleId, original_time as originalTime, count(id) as matchCount from ms_alarm_information where update_user_portrait = 0 and is_delete = 0 group by user_name,match_rule_id,original_time order by user_name,count(id) desc
LIMIT #{pageNo},#{pageSize}
mapper.insert:
insert into ms_alarm_information
id,
match_rule_id,
is_delete,
update_user_portrait,
gmt_create,
gmt_modified,
original_time,
user_name,
alarm_content,
global_trace_id,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{matchRuleId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{updateUserPortrait,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{originalTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{alarmContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{globalTraceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

insert into ms_alarm_information ( user_name, alarm_content, global_trace_id, original_time, match_rule_id ) values
( #{item.userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.alarmContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.globalTraceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.originalTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.matchRuleId,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE original_time=values(original_time)
mapper.update:
update ms_alarm_information
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT},
update_user_portrait = #{updateUserPortrait,jdbcType=TINYINT},
match_rule_id = #{matchRuleId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
original_time = #{originalTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
alarm_content = #{alarmContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
global_trace_id = #{globalTraceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
